title: How to Give Your Son a Zerbert or Raspberry

steps.title: Have him lie face up across your knee
steps.content: Have him lie face up across your knee

steps.title: Gently place one hand on his back to offer support and make sure he does not fall off your knee
steps.content: Gently place one hand on his back to offer support and make sure he does not fall off your knee

steps.title: With the other hand lift up his shirt and or jumper (if he is wearing one)
steps.content: With the other hand lift up his shirt and or jumper (if he is wearing one)

steps.title: Begin to form raspberry or zerbert in mouth
steps.content: Begin to form raspberry or zerbert in mouth

steps.title: Gently press your lips into his belly and blow
steps.content: Gently press your lips into his belly and blow

steps.title: You can change things up by pretending to be a lion and making growling, chewing noises while nibbling his belly.
steps.content: You can change things up by pretending to be a lion and making growling, chewing noises while nibbling his belly.

steps.title: You can also gobble up his neck, legs and feet!
steps.content: You can also gobble up his neck, legs and feet!
